alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Back (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 30 at 4:03AM MDT until March 31 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches, except 8 to 16 inches in the Ogden Valley. * WHERE...Wasatch Back. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers will continue across the area today. Snow will increase and become heavy at times this evening through tonight, particularly across the Ogden Valley.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
